<div id="v_version" class="registered_link"></div>

The `V$VERSION` view provides information about product compatibility.

| Name     | Type   | Description                                 |
| -------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------- |
| `banner` | `TEXT` | Displays product compatibility information. |
